projects.title: Expence Manger App
projects.description: A full-stack application to track daily expenses, categorize spending, and visualize financial trends using interactive charts and filters.

projects.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: A machine learning project that analyzes sentiments of tweets using Natural Language Processing to classify them as positive, negative, or neutral.

projects.title: Fake News Detection
projects.description: Implemented a classification model to identify fake news articles using NLP techniques like TF-IDF and logistic regression.

projects.title: E-commerce Full Stack Website
projects.description: Developed a complete MERN stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product listings, cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: University Management System
projects.description: A web-based system to manage university operations including student enrollment, faculty details, and course registrations.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: A React-based video platform allowing users to browse, categorize, and view educational and entertainment videos.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: A real-time cryptocurrency dashboard that displays market prices, trends, and coin statistics using CoinGecko API.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: An interactive shopping cart app built with React, featuring product listing, quantity management, and dynamic price updates.
